allow: Bash(powershell -Command "Get-ChildItem -Recurse -Filter ''*.py'' | Where-Object { $_FullName -notmatch ''__pycache__'' -and $_FullName -notmatch ''test_'' } | ForEach-Object { $lines = \(Get-Content $_FullName | Measure-Object -Line\).Lines; if \($lines -gt 150\) { Write-Host $_Name '':'' $lines ''lines'' } }")

Bash(python3 -c "import ast; files = __import__\(''subprocess''\).check_output\(''find agents SHARED -name ""*.py"" -not -path ""*__pycache__*"" -not -path ""*test*""'', shell=True, text=True\).strip\(\).split\(''\\n''\); print\(f''Total Python modules: {len\([f for f in files if f]\)}''\); print\(f''Sample files:''\); import subprocess; print\(subprocess.check_output\(''find agents SHARED -type f -name ""*.py"" | grep -v __pycache__ | head -20'', shell=True, text=True\)\)")
